name: Detective Esmee [Short RPG]
description:
Detective Esmee

Detective Esmee is a short little RPG game made in RPG maker VX Ace in less than 10 hours.

Esmee is a little girl who wants nothing more than to be a detective and solve mysteries. Her first case... missing parents...

You can:

. Interact with almost any object you see and here Esmee's thoughts (she is a professional detective!)

. 4 small environments to explore and discover.

. Tons of dialouge (mostly Esmee's opinion on certain things in the world)

Controls:

Movement = Arrow Keys

Interact (open doors, examine) = Enter/Space Bar

Dash/Sprint = Shift (left in incase you want to be even quicker about beating it)

This game was fun to make and only took a short amount of time, I'm not hugly familiar with RPG maker but this was easy enough to create with a little help from google, I hope you all enjoy it :)
